poses.name: Centering Breath
poses.description: Begin your practice with mindful breathing to center yourself and prepare for the session.
poses.instructions: Sit comfortably with your spine straight. Close your eyes and take slow, deep breaths. Count 4 counts in, hold for 4, exhale for 6.

poses.name: Dragon Pose
poses.description: Active hip opener that targets the hip flexors and strengthens the legs.
poses.instructions: From downward dog, step right foot between hands. Lower back knee down, sink hips forward.

poses.name: Wide-Legged Forward Fold
poses.description: Gentle forward fold with wide legs that opens the inner thighs and back body.
poses.instructions: Sit with legs wide, hands behind hips. Slowly walk hands forward, keeping spine long.

poses.name: Seated Forward Fold
poses.description: Deep forward fold that stretches the entire back body and promotes inner reflection.
poses.instructions: Sit with legs extended, hinge at hips to fold forward. Rest hands on legs or floor, keep spine long.

poses.name: Pigeon Pose
poses.description: Deep hip opener that releases tension in the hip flexors and can bring up emotional releases.
poses.instructions: From table top, bring right knee behind right wrist, extend left leg back. Fold forward over front leg.

poses.name: Savasana
poses.description: Final relaxation pose that integrates the practice and promotes deep rest.
poses.instructions: Lie flat on back with arms and legs comfortably apart. Close eyes and breathe naturally.
